name: Peer Approval
description: Just one eligible voter needs to approve an expense in order for it to pass (requires honor system: submitter should not vote)

check.name: main
check.codes:
if not proposal.vote_post_id:
  return None

yes_votes = proposal.get_yes_votes().count()
no_votes = proposal.get_no_votes().count()
proposal.data.set("yes_votes_num", yes_votes)
proposal.data.set("no_votes_num", no_votes)
logger.debug(f"{yes_votes} for, {no_votes} against")
if yes_votes >= 1:
  return PASSED
elif no_votes >= variables.maximum_no_allowed:
  return FAILED

return PROPOSED

name: Consensus Approval
description: All of the eligible voters need to approve an expense in order for it to pass.

check.name: main
check.codes:
if not proposal.vote_post_id:
  return None

yes_votes = proposal.get_yes_votes().count()
no_votes = proposal.get_no_votes().count()
proposal.data.set("yes_votes_num", yes_votes)
proposal.data.set("no_votes_num", no_votes)
logger.debug(f"{yes_votes} for, {no_votes} against")
if no_votes >= 1:
  return FAILED
elif yes_votes >= len(variables.users):
  return PASSED

return PROPOSED
